items.content_html: Lightweight JavaScript library for manipulating with HTML DOM
items.title: theastroscout/qx: Lightweight JavaScript library for manipulating with HTML DOM

items.content_html: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.
items.title: orchidjs/tom-select: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.

items.content_html: The NodeJS reference implementation of BLEST (Batch-able, Lightweight, Encrypted State Transfer), an improved communication protocol for web APIs which leverages JSON, supports request batching and selective returns, and provides a modern alternative to REST.
items.title: jhuntdev/blest-js: The NodeJS reference implementation of BLEST (Batch-able, Lightweight, Encrypted State Transfer), an improved communication protocol for web APIs which leverages JSON, supports request batching and selective returns, and provides a modern alternative to REST.

items.content_html: Store is a lightweight shared state library by the StencilJS core team. Implements a simple key/value map that efficiently re-renders components when necessary.
items.title: ionic-team/stencil-store: Store is a lightweight shared state library by the StencilJS core team. Implements a simple key/value map that efficiently re-renders components when necessary.

items.content_html: PondLive is a lightweight, and easy to use serverside only web framework, leveraging the power of PondSocket to create a simple, yet powerful, SPA framework.
items.title: Eleven-am/pondLive: PondLive is a lightweight, and easy to use serverside only web framework, leveraging the power of PondSocket to create a simple, yet powerful, SPA framework.

items.content_html: Bind is a lightweight JavaScript framework designed for managing state and connecting components to state changes.
items.title: sswahn/bind: Bind is a lightweight JavaScript framework designed for managing state and connecting components to state changes.

items.content_html: A lightweight and highly customizable table component for React. Designed with flexibility in mind, this component is perfect for developers who want full control over their table's appearance and behavior without the bloat of heavier solutions.
items.title: s-roueche/bespoke-table: A lightweight and highly customizable table component for React. Designed with flexibility in mind, this component is perfect for developers who want full control over their table's appearance and behavior without the bloat of heavier solutions.

items.content_html: GStime is a lightweight, feature-rich, and easy-to-use JavaScript library designed to simplify HTML document traversing, event handling, and manipulation of content, making it perfect for fast web development. It's a great choice if you're familiar with jQuery but are looking for a smaller library that offers the most commonly used features.
items.title: GLOBUS-studio/GStime-JavaScript-Library: GStime is a lightweight, feature-rich, and easy-to-use JavaScript library designed to simplify HTML document traversing, event handling, and manipulation of content, making it perfect for fast web development. It's a great choice if you're familiar with jQuery but are looking for a smaller library that offers the most commonly used features.
